publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-161.2 Carolyn Leckie: Care Homes for the Elderly-As an amendment to motion (S2M-161) in the name of Mr David Davidson, leave out from "threat" to end and insert "threatened closure of the majority of the Church of Scotland's care homes; notes the work of the non-profit-making homes, and calls on the Scottish Executive to undertake a review into its funding for such homes and to recognise that health and social care are a basic right and, as such, should be provided and funded by the public sector."
